02/28/2017 OIS NEWS - 05/24/2017 Coronavirus/COVID-19 Updates for the UIC International Community Home html    Coronavirus/COVID-19 Updates for the UIC International Community  International Student Orientation       Welcome to UIC!  OIS supports new international students through the transition to life in the U.S. and study at UIC during International Student Orientation.   Learn more about International Student Orientation                                                                                                     xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"? Announcements OIS Services Moving All Online Effective March 17 International Travel Guidance for the UIC International Community Certain Immigration Applications and Petitions Immediately Subject to Public Charge Final Rule Potential Site Visits by DHS of Employers that Train STEM OPT Students International Student, Scholar, and Employee Tax Obligations and Support - Filing Deadline, July 15 Executive and Court Orders on Travel and Immigration: Information and Resources - Updated 2/6/2020 UIC Addresses Coronavirus Spring 2020 International Student Status Maintenance Reminders Illinois Law on Marijuana Use and Impact on the UIC International Community USCIS Updates Policy Pursuant to Two Recent Attorney General Decisions Court Allows WashTech Challenge to Proceed for All OPT SEVP Clarifies Policy Regarding Distribution of Form I-20 DHS Increases I-901 SEVIS Fee Effective June 24, 2019 Proposed DHS Rule Rescinding H-4 Employment Authorization Expected Soon Significant Changes to Form I-539 to be Implemented Beginning March 11, 2019 Consular Operations Abroad Potentially Impacted by a U.S. Government Shutdown Introduction of Proposed Rule of Inadmissibility on Public Charge Grounds USCIS Previously Released “Notice to Appear” Policy Clarified and Commences Monday, October 1, 2018 USCIS Tightens Language on Employer-Employee Relationships and Third-Party Placement for STEM OPT Students USCIS to Begin Using More Secure Mail Delivery Service USCIS Expands Credit Card Payment Option to Most Fee-Based Forms USCIS Updates Form I-765 to Include Optional Application for a Social Security Card Immigration Scams Warning More Announcements and Archives     html   Multimedia            .
